item.name: Aegon the Conqueror
item.description: United the Seven Kingdoms with dragons. Created the Iron Throne. Rode Balerion the Black Dread.

item.name: Daenerys Targaryen
item.description: Mother of Dragons, breaker of chains, and near-claimant to the Iron Throne. Rode Drogon.

item.name: Jon Snow
item.description: Bastard turned hero. Defeated the Night King and is the true heir to the Iron Throne.

item.name: Tyrion Lannister
item.description: The cleverest man in Westeros. Served as Hand of the King and Queen. Master of survival.

item.name: Rhaenyra Targaryen
item.description: First woman to claim the Iron Throne. Her claim caused the Dance of the Dragons. Rode Syrax.

item.name: Daemon Targaryen
item.description: Rogue Prince, fearless warrior, loyal to Rhaenyra. Rode the dragon Caraxes.

item.name: Ned Stark
item.description: Honorable lord of Winterfell. His death triggered the War of the Five Kings.

item.name: Tywin Lannister
item.description: Ruthless strategist and Hand of the King. Led House Lannister to dominance.

item.name: Jaime Lannister
item.description: From Kingslayer to tragic hero. Known for complex redemption and loyalty. Wielded Oathkeeper.
